text: Prafulla Kumar Mandal was a Bangladesh Nationalist Party politician. He was elected a member of parliament from Khulna-1 in February 1996. == Career == Prafulla Kumar Mandal was elected to parliament from Khulna-1 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate in 15 February 1996 Bangladeshi general election. He was defeated from Khulna-1 constituency on 12 June 1996 on the nomination of Bangladesh Nationalist Party. == References == Category:Hindus Category:Politicians from Khulna Division Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:6th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Prafulla Kumar Mandal
